dc:title: Corrected Calcium for Hypo- or Hyperalbuminemia
dc:description: Corrects the patient's measured serum calcium level to account for their serum albumin level.

ca.description: The patient's serum calcium level in miligrams per deciliter.

albumin.description: The patient's serum albumin level in grams per deciliter.

nl_alb.description: The normal serum albumin level. Optional. The default is 4 mg/dL.
